title: Root Beer Pulled Pork
directions: Place pork butt in a 6-quart or larger slow cooker. Add onion and root beer.
Place lid on slow cooker and cook on LOW for 8 to 10 hours.
Remove pork from slow cooker. Discard all the liquid.
Shred pork and return to slow cooker. Stir in the bbq sauce.
Cover and cook on HIGH for 30 minutes.
ingredients: 1 (3 to 4 pound) pork butt, trimmed of excess fat
